title: STEAM-Based Packaging Design Creativity Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental design principles and understanding of scientific/engineering concepts
context.additional_context: Learning packaging design methodologies integrating creativity and STEAM education for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Packaging design prototypes can be developed utilizing the six stages of the CREATE model (Concrete Experience, Reflective Observation, Abstract Conceptualization, Test Experimentation, Evaluation, Articulation)
The ability to integrate scientific/technological/engineering elements into artistic design is enhanced according to STEAM education principles
Packaging designs reflecting structural flexibility and creativity are produced using 3D modeling software and digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
